text: Joseph Hahn (born March 15, 1977) is an American musician, DJ, director and visual artist best known as the DJ and backing vocalist of the American rock band Linkin Park, doing the scratching, turntables, sampling, and programming for all seven of Linkin Park's albums. Category:1977 births Category:American DJs Category:American heavy metal musicians Category:Musicians from Glendale, California Category:Musicians from Dallas Category:Linkin Park members Category:Living people
title: Joe Hahn
